Home / Interviewees / Dave Thomas

Dave Thomas

2 interviews in the archive.

Dave Thomas is Chairman of Bedarra Corp, founder of YOW! Conferences, former managing director at Object Mentor, and a GOTO Conference Fellow focused on large-scale software engineering.
